Tags

Hierarchical organization is a great first step, but I also find myself needing to create cross-cutting categories of notes. Polish that Apple

In the end, I‚Äôd love to see Apple reuse the UI and logic from Notes in Calendar et al to allow custom nested groups. It‚Äôd be great to see them add tagging, whether similar to other note-taking apps like Letterspace, or more like that in Finder‚Ä¶ and provide ways to organize everything by those tags as well as groups.

In general, whenever a user has some set of their data, they might find it helpful to be able to organize the collection in arbitrary ways. A simple tagging facility helps solve that problem.
